docset.p: The plug-in search paths determines where Maike can find plug-ins. Whenever a plug-in is found in any of the mentioned directories, Maike will use that plug-in.

section.h2: Search paths on a GNU system running on the Linux® kernel
section.p: On a GNU system running on the Linux® kernel, Maike looks for plug-ins in the following directories. The filename suffix .so is added automatically.
